Module software1.software1
Package software1.software1

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
software1.software1.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Maintains all parts and products within the application. Responsible for assigning IDs to newly created parts and products.

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart(int partId)
      Locates a specific Part based on the associated ID.
      Parameters:
      partId - The ID of a Part.
      Returns:
      A Part object if an ID is found. Returns null otherwise.

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct(int productId)
      Locates a specific Product based on the associated ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of a Product.
      Returns:
      A Product object if an ID is found. Returns null otherwise.

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(String partName)
      Searches the inventory for Parts based on search criteria.
      Parameters:
      partName - The string used in the search.
      Returns:
      Returns a filtered list of Parts.

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct(String productName)
      Searches the inventory for Products based on search criteria.
      Parameters:
      productName - The string used in the search.
      Returns:
      Returns a filtered list of Products.

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      Updates a Part object with new values.
      Parameters:
      index - The location of part within the global parts list.
      selectedPart - The new Part object used for replacement.

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product newProduct)
      Updates a Product object with new values.
      Parameters:
      index - The location of product within the global products list.
      newProduct - The new Product object used for replacement.

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      Removes a part from the application inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - The Part to be removed.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean as true if a part is found and removed.

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      Removes a product from the application inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - The Product to be removed.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean as true if a part is found and removed.

    • getAllParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      Retrieves all parts currently listed in the inventory.
      Returns:
      A list of Parts.

    • getAllProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products currently listed in the inventory.
      Returns:
      A list of Products.

    • generatePartId

      public static int generatePartId()
      Generates a Part ID based on the current count. IDs are issued in numerical order.
      Returns:
      Returns an int.

    • generateProductId

      public static int generateProductId()
      Generates a Product ID based on the current count. IDs are issues in numberical order.
      Returns:
      Returns an int.

    • setTestData

      public static void setTestData()
      Creates Part and Product objects to be used a test data throughout the life of the application.
